description:
At the end of my course, you will be able to start working successfully as a freelancer online, well on your way to make a decent income.

Identify your strengths and leverage them to serve customers in the marketplace

Who should take this course? Who should not?

This course is for anyone new to freelancing, or those who have tried earlier, but not been very successful in making a decent earning on a regular basis. It covers using the major online platforms today to begin freelancing

Anyone looking for ways to create their own website to freelance, would not find this course very useful.

What will you need to know or do before starting the course?

The basic ability to pay attention and following through will do. No genius IQ or prior experiences are necessary.

This course requires application of strategies and methods discussed to facilitate students to freelance online successfully. Lack of commitment would lead to poorer results.
title: Freelancing for Financial Freedom
